Package manager

Class SceneManager

java.lang.Object
manager.SceneManager
public class SceneManager extends Object
The SceneManager class is responsible for managing different scenes in the game. It handles scene creation, switching, and maintains player position across scenes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SceneManager(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
    Constructs a SceneManager with the specified primary stage.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addScene(MapType mapType, javafx.scene.Scene scene, GridManager gridManager, EntityManager entityManager, CoordinatesLoader coordinatesLoader)
    Adds a scene to the manager along with its associated grid manager, entity manager, and coordinates loader.
    void
    changeScene(MapType mapType)
    Changes the current scene to the specified map type, saving the player's position if necessary.
    CoordinatesLoader
    createCoordinatesLoader(MapType mapType)
    Creates and returns a new CoordinatesLoader for the specified map type.

    Shows the scene for the specified map type.

  • Method Details

    • addScene

      public void addScene(MapType mapType, javafx.scene.Scene scene, GridManager gridManager, EntityManager entityManager, CoordinatesLoader coordinatesLoader)
      Adds a scene to the manager along with its associated grid manager, entity manager, and coordinates loader.
      Parameters:
      mapType - The type of the map.
      scene - The scene to be added.
      gridManager - The grid manager for the scene.
      entityManager - The entity manager for the scene.
      coordinatesLoader - The coordinates loader for the scene.

    • createCoordinatesLoader

      public CoordinatesLoader createCoordinatesLoader(MapType mapType)
      Creates and returns a new CoordinatesLoader for the specified map type.
      Parameters:
      mapType - The type of the map.
      Returns:
      A new CoordinatesLoader.

    • showScene

      public void showScene(MapType mapType)
      Shows the scene for the specified map type.
      Parameters:
      mapType - The type of the map.

    • changeScene

      public void changeScene(MapType mapType)
      Changes the current scene to the specified map type, saving the player's position if necessary.
      Parameters:
      mapType - The type of the map to switch to.
